price: Dhugumatti, warri kafaranii kaafirtoota ta’anii du’an, sunniin abaarsi Rabbii, malaa’ikootaafi kan namoota hundaatuu isaan irratti jiraata.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū wamātū wahum kuffārun ulāika ʿalayhim laʿnatu al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
